Recycling instructions text: Ensure the wine bottle is empty, remove any labels, and separate the glass bottle, cork stopper, and metal caps for recycling according to local guidelines
KRAV: KRAV certification ensures wine is made using sustainable, organic practices. It promotes biodiversity, eco-friendly methods, and responsible resource use in vineyards, with minimal chemicals and a focus on soil health and worker welfare. KRAV-certified wines reflect a commitment to both quality and environmental care.
SQNPI: SQNPI certification focuses on sustainable viticulture in Italy, encouraging responsible farming practices. It emphasizes reduced chemical use, soil health, and biodiversity in vineyards. SQPNI-certified wines are produced with a balance of quality, tradition, and environmental responsibility.
EU_ORGANIC: Organic farming focuses on sustainable practices that enhance biodiversity, prioritize eco-friendly methods, and ensure high-quality standards, fostering trust and care for the environment.
